# docs-generator

> Generate comprehensive documentation from OSSA manifests

## Quick Reference

- **Type**: OSSA Agent v0.4.1
- **Category**: documentation
- **Manifest**: docs-generator.ossa.yaml

## Overview

Generate complete documentation from OSSA manifests including:
- README.md
- API documentation
- Usage examples
- Integration guides

## Related

- Main OSSA documentation: /README.md
- Agent manifest: ./docs-generator.ossa.yaml
- Agent details: ./AGENTS.md
